segments.text: Suddenly, my eyes catch the overflowing sink—wow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours out like a waterfall onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate hasn't a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's spotless, but the floor's a lake now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climb on that stool shocks me— so high!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, grinning I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks excited, palm up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end badly with the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems worlds away from this frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby might topple if there's a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how unaware the adult is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar tempts with its contents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a lively, unexpected kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
